page.shortlink: grid component client side canrowswitchtoeditable event
page.description: Fires when the user switches the row to editable mode. The Grid's Row edit style property must be set to 'edit on demand'. If the event returns false, the action is cancelled.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: field
property.description: The field the user double-clicked to put the row into edit mode.

property.name: newRecordRowsVisible
property.description: Indicates whether or not the new record rows are being shown. If *[js:true]*, new record rows are visible. Otherwise, *[js:false]*.

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
